title: IT TAKES A THIEF 317 Touch of Magic [retr?tv]
description:
IT TAKES A THIEF - 3x17 - Touch of Magic    1/26/1970

Al finds out that an old family friend, Bessie Grindle (Bette Davis), is in a charity ward and has lost the will to live.  The doctor suggests that she needs an occupation, a hobby. Since Bessie Grindle "was the greatest female jewel thief that ever lived", Al invites her on a caper for which he needs her "magic touch". 

Stars: Robert Wagner as Alexander Mundy
Special Guest Star:*Bette Davis* as Bessie Grindel
Supporting Cast: Edward Binns (Wally), Maurice Marsac (Carlo Rubano),  Douglas Henderson (Doctor)
